SEARCH
Package com.ttc.fitPT.ptSchedule.controller

Class AdminController

java.lang.Object
com.ttc.fitPT.ptSchedule.controller.AdminController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/api/admin") public class AdminController extends Object
AdminController provides endpoints for managing users, therapists, and certifications.

  • Method Details

    • adminDashboard

      @GetMapping("/dashboard") public String adminDashboard()
      Displays the admin dashboard page.
      Returns:
      the name of the admin dashboard view.

    • getUserInfo

      @GetMapping("/users") @ResponseBody public List<User> getUserInfo(@RequestParam(value="sortBy",required=false) String sortBy, @RequestParam(value="sortOrder",required=false) String sortOrder, @RequestParam(value="personType",required=false) String personType)
      Retrieves a list of users with optional sorting and filtering.
      Parameters:
      sortBy - the field to sort by (optional).
      sortOrder - the sorting order (asc/desc, optional).
      personType - the type of person to filter by (optional).
      Returns:
      a list of users.

    • getTherapistInfo

      @GetMapping("/therapist/{id}") @ResponseBody public Map<String,Object> getTherapistInfo(@PathVariable int id) throws Exception
      Retrieves detailed therapist information by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the therapist's ID.
      Returns:
      a map containing therapist details and certifications.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the therapist info retrieval fails.

    • getCertificationInfo

      @GetMapping("/certification/{abbr}") @ResponseBody public Map<String,String> getCertificationInfo(@PathVariable String abbr)
      Retrieves certification details by its abbreviation.
      Parameters:
      abbr - the certification abbreviation.
      Returns:
      a map containing certification details.

    • deleteUser

      @DeleteMapping("/user/{id}") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteUser(@PathVariable int id)
      Deletes a user by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the user's ID.
      Returns:
      a response entity indicating the result of the operation.

    • editUser

      @PutMapping("/user/{id}") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,String>> editUser(@PathVariable int id, @RequestBody Map<String,String> updates)
      Updates user information by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the user's ID.
      updates - a map containing the updated user fields.
      Returns:
      a response entity with a success message.

    • addUser

      @PostMapping("/user") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> addUser(@RequestBody Map<String,Object> newUser)
      Adds a new user to the system.
      Parameters:
      newUser - a map containing user details.
      Returns:
      a response entity indicating the result of the operation.

    • getAllCertifications

      @GetMapping("/certifications") @ResponseBody public List<Certification> getAllCertifications()
      Retrieves all certifications in the system.
      Returns:
      a list of certifications.

    • getTherapistCertifications

      @GetMapping("/therapist/{id}/certifications") @ResponseBody public List<String> getTherapistCertifications(@PathVariable int id)
      Retrieves certifications for a specific therapist by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the therapist's ID.
      Returns:
      a list of certifications for the therapist.

    • addSystemCertification

      @PostMapping("/certification") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> addSystemCertification(@RequestBody Map<String,String> certData)
      Adds a new certification to the system.
      Parameters:
      certData - a map containing certification details.
      Returns:
      a response entity indicating the result of the operation.

    • deleteSystemCertification

      @DeleteMapping("/certification/{abbreviation}") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteSystemCertification(@PathVariable String abbreviation)
      Deletes a certification from the system by its abbreviation.
      Parameters:
      abbreviation - the certification abbreviation.
      Returns:
      a response entity indicating the result of the operation.

    • addTherapistCertification

      @PostMapping("/therapist/{id}/certification") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> addTherapistCertification(@PathVariable int id, @RequestBody Map<String,String> certData)
      Assigns a certification to a therapist.
      Parameters:
      id - the therapist's ID.
      certData - a map containing the certification abbreviation.
      Returns:
      a response entity indicating the result of the operation.

    • deleteTherapistCertification

      @DeleteMapping("/therapist/{id}/certification/{abbreviation}") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteTherapistCertification(@PathVariable int id, @PathVariable String abbreviation)
      Removes a certification from a therapist.
      Parameters:
      id - the therapist's ID.
      abbreviation - the certification abbreviation.
      Returns:
      a response entity indicating the result of the operation.
